text:
We still need to persuade about 1/3 of the 🇺🇸 to get a #COVID19 #vaccine:

👉66% of the wait & see group were most swayed by msg that vax prevents ~100% of hosp/death

👉Indiv clinicians were most trusted messengers

Discuss #COVIDVaccines w/ EVERYONE, #MedTwitter #NurseTwitter! https://t.co/lsruZnYUMh
